basics.name: Chris Arsenault
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: A full stack developer from Toronto, Ontario, with a passion for all things front-end. I am extremely motivated and driven to grow my knowledge and skills in web development. With my many years working in the hospitality district, I have substantial experience of working as a team, as well as team building. I am excited to bring my eager attitude and past team experience into an innovative environment.

highlights: data entry, migrating content from old client site to new updated site
created basic html tables to help organize some of the information
custom css work to fix with some of the formatting and aesthetic
connected GoogleMap API and billing to new account
general maintenance of the pre-existing website
customize layouts as per client's needs
plugin maintenance which increased speed and search optimization. Brought PageSpeed score from initial 35% to 74%
worked directly with each city host (approx 30-40) clients to add new updates and revisions to their individual event page (adding logos, documents, location details, speaker information, etc)
live streaming capabilities for each host location
set up Zendesk and created a custom theme for a knowledge base and community section
integrated a method to connect the Mailchimp account with separate GoogleSheets to collect signup information for each host, when interested parties requested an invite to their cities Summit.
giving tours to new perspective members
being knowledgeable and up-to-date on all club related news and events
training all new front desk staff
set up Zendesk and created a custom theme for a knowledge base and community section
assisting with any requests from other departments

publications.name: Drawango
publications.summary: A drawing/guessing party game built to learn to work further with React and Canvas in a realtime drawing environment.

publications.name: Jungle App
publications.summary: An e-commerce Rails app built for learning Rails

publications.name: Chatty App
publications.summary: Simple single page chat app built with React and Websockets

publications.name: Hookeai Poke
publications.summary: A food ordering and pickup service for the fictitious restaurant 'Hookeai Pookeai'
